类 KnowledgeController

java.lang.Object
com.lawfirm.knowledge.controller.KnowledgeController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/knowledge") @Validated public class KnowledgeController extends Object

    • deleteKnowledge

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public void deleteKnowledge(@PathVariable Long id)

    • publishKnowledge

      @PostMapping("/{id}/publish") public void publishKnowledge(@PathVariable Long id)

    • pageKnowledge

      @GetMapping("/page") public com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.metadata.IPage<Knowledge> pageKnowledge(@RequestParam(defaultValue="1") Integer page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") Integer size, @RequestParam(required=false) Integer type, @RequestParam(required=false) Integer status, @RequestParam(required=false) String keyword)

      @GetMapping("/category/{categoryId}") public List<Knowledge> listByCategory(@PathVariable Long categoryId)

    • listByTag

      @GetMapping("/tag/{tag}") public List<Knowledge> listByTag(@PathVariable String tag)

      @GetMapping("/author/{authorId}") public List<Knowledge> listByAuthor(@PathVariable Long authorId)

      @PostMapping("/{id}/view") public void viewKnowledge(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam Long userId, @RequestParam String ip)

      @PostMapping("/{id}/like") public void likeKnowledge(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam Long userId)

    • unlikeKnowledge

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}/like") public void unlikeKnowledge(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam Long userId)

    • favoriteKnowledge

      @PostMapping("/{id}/favorite") public void favoriteKnowledge(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam Long userId)
